name: Lost-Format
description:
Support my work: https://ko-fi.com/hauntaku

Overview

Lost-Format is an unusual text-based indie horror game currently in the early prototype stage.

This software contains content that may be disturbing to some viewers. Please avoid using the software if you have photosensitivity or have had seizures in the past.

Remember to take breaks while using the software and document your discoveries on the internet. Thank you for your co-operation.
